value: The release 0.4-RC marks a significant shift in our approach to teaching. Rather than focusing solely on fundamental operations and following a linear progression of knowledge, we are introducing new tools to make learning more accessible and reach a broader audience.

• Atlas: Based on feedback from readers, we have created a new Atlas to teach geometrical and physics concepts, addressing common areas of misunderstanding.
  • Markdown: In addition to supporting pure HTML, History Tracers now supports Markdown, making text editing and formatting easier.
  • Families: We are reintroducing the use of families as a pedagogical tool to teach History, Math, and Biology in an integrated way.
  • "First steps" Section: After completing the first chapter, we have advanced to the second, focusing on teaching comparisons and delving deeper into the concept of limits.
  • Images: We have started reorganizing the images in History Tracers, incorporating authorized materials from various museums to enrich the learning experience.
  • Design: The applicationâ€™s design has been enhanced to provide a better user experience, especially on smartphones.
We wish everyone a rewarding learning experience and hope you enjoy the new features!
